strawpoll.default_footer: Command will be canceled in 15 seconds. Type "cancel" to cancel now. Attempt 1 of 5.
strawpoll.multiple_votes_description: Should users be able to submit multiple votes? <__Y__es/__N__o>
strawpoll.duplication_checking_description:
How should duplication checking be handled?
`normal` for IP checking, `permissive` for browser cookie checking, `disabled` for no checking.
strawpoll.captcha_description: Should the poll include a captcha? <__Y__es/__N__o>
no_title: You'll uh.. you'll need a title for that poll there.
It's pretty hard to make a poll without a title.
You gonna ask a question? Polls aren't very useful without questions.
no_options: You probably want some options with that poll, right?
Polls are *extremely* difficult to conduct if people can't answer them. You just get no data. You're sad. People are sad. We're all sad.
strawpoll.too_many_polls: I've created too many polls this hour. Try again later. Sorry 'bout that.
strawpoll.not_enough_options: Minimum two options. Seriously, what's the point in one option? What?
strawpoll.too_many_options: Are you actually insane? Why do you need more than 30 options? Anyways, strollpoll.me won't take it, so I won't take it.
strawpoll.error:
Error while creating poll: $err
Please report this in the support server if you'd like it fixed.

ud.nsfw: Apparently the urban dictionary is NSFW. I know, it's annoying, just tryin' to keep this bot afloat. (You can only use this command in NSFW channels)

You word.. whatever it is.. is not on the urban dictionary.
Nope. Not even the *urban dictionary* has your word.
ud.footer: Authored by $author | Ratings: +$thumbsup, -$thumbsdown | Hover over links for definitions
ud.catch: The definition was probably too long to fit in a message, sorry, can't send it.

no_args: You have to tell me what to take a picture of..

blacklisted_website: im not taking a picture of that.. im just not..
timed_out: That website is too powerful! It's taken me more than 30 seconds to render, so I'm canceling the render. Sorry!
Your website is too powerful for me; it's taken over 30 seconds to render it. Nop.
webshot.invalid_url: Hey, you gotta provide me with a *valid* url, okay? Your trickery caused you a 10 second cooldown, mister.

leaderboard.invalid_page: `$page` is not a valid page number.
leaderboard.negative_or_zero_page: There is no page 0 or negative page.
leaderboard.not_enough_people: Not enough people have talked to generate page $page.

xpinfo.description: Arthur has a leveling system that will give you XP and eventually level you up while you type messages. This is $levels for this server and can be toggled by a server manager with `$prefix​leveling`.
xpinfo.settings_message:
XP revolves around **$base**, for a range of **$min** to **$max** XP per message.
XP is added every **$seconds** seconds.
To achieve level one, you need **$levelOne** XP.
Each level requires **$mult**x as much XP as the previous.
The maximum XP will be multiplied for activity is **$maxMult**x.

blacklist.nothing_to_display: Nothin' to display here, carry on.
invalid_user: Did you make that person up in your imagination? They don't exist. You can't blacklist people that aren't here. It just doesn't work.
Who? I.. can't find whoever it is you're trying to find.
That person just.. doesn't exist. rip.
A real person would be nice.
I could not find the member whom you have tried to find. Could you try again with someone who *exists*?
self_blacklist: Hey. I'm not blacklisting you from me. Thanks, but no thanks.
You can't.. you can't do that. At least, I won't let you do that.
Seriously, you don't like me that much? Wow. Alright. I see how it is. Why don't you just kick me then, if that's how it's going to be?
blacklist.already_blacklisted:
This person is already blacklisted.
Go ahead and run `unblacklist $id` if you don't want them blacklisted anymore. Thanks.
blacklist.blacklisted:
**$tag** has been blacklisted from usage of Arthur in this server. Riperoni in pepperoni.
Should you want to unblacklist them, run `unblacklist $id`.
Have a good day. :thumbsup:

That's gonna need to be shorter. No sexual reference intended.

no_args: Well? You gonna choose who you want to unblacklist? Or just ~~stand~~ sit there?
I'm on it. I'll unblacklist ` ` right away.
unblacklist.self_blacklist: You're clearly not blacklisted if I'm talking to you. You alright there, bud?
unblacklist.not_blacklisted: That person isn't blacklisted. How nice of you, looking out for those who are doing just fine.
unblacklist.unblacklisted: Like magic, **$tag** can interact with me again. :tada:

poll.footer: Command will cancel in 60 seconds. Type "cancel" to cancel now. Attempt 1 of 5.

title.title: Poll title
title.description: What would you like the poll title to be?

options.title: Poll options
options.description:
What poll options would you like?
Separate each option with a `|` character (below the backspace key).
Maximum 10 options.

time.title: Poll time
time.description:
How long would you like the poll to run for?
e.g. `2d 8h 3m 14s` (maximum time of one week)

like.no_song_specified: Alright so if there's no music playing *how am I gonna like the currently playing song*? Eh? You see how that doesn't work?
like.song_already_liked: Mhm, you think I'm gonna let you like a song twice. No. I don't care how good it is, go get your ~~alt~~ friend to like it.

no_likes: You don't have any likes tho..
You're gonna need to like some songs if ya want me to display some liked songs.
You uh.. You haven't liked a song yet..
liked.invalid_page: Eyy that's not a page number, I'd love it if you'd supply me with a *real* page number, thanks.
liked.negative_page: Negative pages don't exist, okay? Think of a book. Does said book have a page -3? I didn't think so.
liked.nonexistent_page: 'That page doesn't exist yet. Go like a ton of songs, make that page, I believe in you!
liked.footer: Page $page of $maxPage | Play a liked song with play liked <number>

likedlb.footer: Page $page of $maxPage | Play a top song with play top <number>

loop.no_music_playing: Ah yes, I'll make sure to loop the nonexistent music. (play some music thanks)
loop.no_permissions: hey you don't have permission to loop the music, weirdo
loop.off: A'ight $name, loops off, as you wish.
loop.on: Loops on, $name, have fun listening to the same song(s) *forever*

nowplaying.nothing_playing: Now playing: The sound of silence

npnotify.message: Now playing notifications have been $status. To disable them, run this command again.

pause.already_paused: The music is already paused. Use `resume` to resume playback.

play.error_getting_info:
I'm havin' trouble gettin' info for that video - `$err`
report this to my support server if you want it fixed. Or don't. I'm not the boss of you.
not_in_channel: Hey man, I can't just play music through your speakers magically. Could you like.. connect to a voice channel?
no_song_specified: What? Do you want me to just play some random song? You seriously think I'd do that? No. Choose your song.
play.cant_join_channel: I can't join the channel you're in. Rude. I wanted to join you, and play you some tunes. The channel I wanted to join wasn't joinable. Do you see this conflict of interests?
play.could_not_connect:
Could not connect to voice channel - `$err`
Try again, if you will. Or go complain in the support server.
play.unavailable_in_us: The video you were trying to play is unavailable in the US - sorry, I'm based there, and can't really do much about that. ~~just reupload the video or gimme a soundcloud link~~

queue.no_music_queued: There is no music queued. Add some with the `play` command.
queue.only_multiple_pages: There are only $pages pages in the queue.
queue.only_one_page: There is only one page in the queue.
queue.footer: Page $page of $maxPage | 1 Song Total | Requested by $name
queue.footer_plural: Page $page of $maxPage | $songs Songs Total | Requested by $name

remove.nothing_playing: I can't remove something from nothing, that breaks some rule of physics.. (There is no music playing)
remove.no_args: Y'all need to specify which song to remove (gimme a number thanks).
remove.not_a_number: Hey.. that's not a number.. (or you chose zero. my point still stands.)
remove.negative_number: there is no negative queue tho <:crazyeyes:359106555314044939>
remove.current_song: hey, use `skip`, don't remove the current song, that breaks things..
remove.does_not_exist_yet: C'mon, there aren't that many songs in the queue.. yet.
remove.success:
Success! Song #$num has been removed from the queue.
*someone might have wanted to hear that song, #Blame$name*

resume.nothing_playing: There is no music playing. How would I resume playback of nothing? :thinking:
resume.already_playing: Music is already playing. Use `pause` to pause playback.

shuffle.no_queue: You want to shuffle the queue, but there is no queue! Queue some music with the `play` command.
shuffle.too_small: There's no point in shuffling a one or two song queue - it won't change the order at all. lul.

skip.no_music: There's no music playing, so how exactly would I skip the current song? Are you insane?

skip.force_message: *To force skip, add `-f` on the end of the command*

unlike.no_args: Yes, I'll just pick the song you want. Y'know, because I have telepathic powers. (tell me which song to remove)
unlike.invalid_number: Hey.. that's not a number.. (or you chose zero, my point still stands.)
unlike.negative_number: There are no negative songs tho <:crazyeyes:359106555314044939>
unlike.too_high_number: I'm sorry, but you just haven't liked that many songs yet.
unlike.no_voice_connection: You have to tell me which song to unlike, lul.
unlike.song_not_liked: Ey bud you haven't even liked this song yet - how would you unlike it?

large_embed.description:
Made by Gymnophoria#8146
When using commands, <> indicates a required argument and [] indicates an optional requirement. (Do not actually type these symbols.)
large_embed.footer: Type $prefix​help <command> for a detailed description of the command

help.send_failed: Message send failed. If you'd like to see the help in this channel, type `$prefix​help -chat`.
help.invalid_command: I do not have a `$command` command.

info.title: Arthur - Yet another Discord bot
info.description: Just a bot with tons of.. average features.
info.author: Author
info.info_value:
Language - Javascript
Node $nodeVersion
Discord.js v$discordVersion
Uptime of $uptime

invite.description: Arthur can be invited with [this link]($invite). You need to have Manage Server or Admin permission to add the bot to a server.

dice.invalid_number: Hey.. that's not a number.. (or you think zero sided dice exist.)
dice.negative_number: The number of sides provided is the same as the number of brain cells you possess.

xp.no_one_talked_yet: No one in this server has talked yet.

music.invalid_file_type: I currently only support playback of the filetypes $filetypes. Feel free to suggest more file types if you need 'em.
file_too_small: Your file isn't powerful enough! I need one bigger than 25 KB, thanks.
That file is, hear me out, too small. Really. I'll need something greater than 25 KB. Thanks.
music.no_liked_songs: If you haven't liked a song yet, it's quite challenging for me to play a liked song.
no_song_specified: Yeah, I'll just pick the song you want. Y'know, because I have telepathic powers. (tell me which song to play)
You didn't specify a song. You realize that, right? I can't play a song if you don't specify one.
music.negative_number: there is no negative song tho <:crazyeyes:359106555314044939>
music.number_too_large: I'm sorry, but you just haven't liked that many songs yet. Go do that.
music.number_too_large_lb: There really aren't that many liked songs yet. You could change that if you wanted..
music.could_not_find_song: Not sure why, but I simply couldn't find that song. Huh.
music.no_file_specified: Hey man, you have to tell me what file to play.. The current options are: $files
music.invalid_file: That file uh.. doesn't exist. Feel free to suggest to add it. What you *can* play are as follows: $files
no_results: The song you searched for could not be found.. rip
Uhh.. Couldn't find anything by that term, sorry.
You sure that's a real song? ..or video?
Yeah. No. Couldn't find it. Sorry.
could_not_get_info: There seems to have been an error retrieving info for that video. Contact support if the issue persists.
I couldn't get info for that song. Odd. Try again? I dunno.
song_too_long: That's a bit excessive, okay? I don't really want to play a song longer than 2 hours for ya.
I'd rather not play a song longer than two hours long, sorry.
song_too_short: Your video isn't powerful enough! I need one longer than 5 seconds, thanks.
That video is, hear me out, too short. Really. I'll need one longer than 5 seconds. Thanks.
The video you selected has small dick energy, give me one longer than 5 seconds.
music.livestream: Trying to play a livestream, eh? Well, no, sorry.
music.file_footer: Added by $tag. | Invalid URLs will be skipped.

message.dm_help: My prefix is `a.`; do `a.help` for help.
message.command_disabled: This command is currently disabled. Join the support server for more information.
message.bot_missing_perms: I lack the permissions(s) needed to run this command: $perms
message.user_cooldown: Woah there, you're being waaay too spicy for me. Could you just chill? Wait another $time second(s), would ya?
message.guild_cooldown: Dude, this guild is just being way too spicy. Some people need to seriously chill.. Wait another $time second(s), will ya?
